audioText: Les coiffeurs de France manifestent aujourd'hui à Paris pour dénoncer la concurrence déloyale exercée, selon eux, par certains barbiers. En cause : des prix coupés au rasoir et des règles pas toujours respectées.
question: Why are French hairdressers protesting in Paris today?
options: To denounce unfair competition from certain barbers with cut-rate prices and disregarded regulations
To demand higher wages and better working conditions for salon employees
To protest against new government regulations on hair salon licensing
To support their union's strike for reduced working hours
explanation: The text states 'Les coiffeurs de France manifestent aujourd'hui à Paris pour dénoncer la concurrence déloyale exercée, selon eux, par certains barbiers. En cause : des prix coupés au rasoir et des règles pas toujours respectées' - French hairdressers are protesting today in Paris to denounce unfair competition exercised, according to them, by certain barbers. The issues: razor-cut prices and rules not always respected.
